titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at a visitation held at Lin in Norfolk, June the 24th anno 1633. Being an admonition to the clergy to remember and keep those severall oaths, promises, and subscriptions, which they solemnly have made at the taking of their degrees, their ordinations, and institutions to their benefices. By William Strode D.D.
titleStmt.author: Strode, William, 1600 or 1601-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Wilson for Samuel Brown, living in Well-yard in Little St. Bartholomews, near the Lame-Hospitall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Well-yard in Little St. Bartholomews, near the Lame-Hospitall
